about: Hey there! I'm Faiyaz, a Software Engineer based in Pune, India. I'm interested in application development and I always enjoy learning new things to improve my skills. I'm also fascinated by other computer science fields like AI.
Apart from the technical stuff, I'm also interested in Badminton üè∏ and Astronomy üî≠.

summary: Engineered REST microservices to enhance system performance and reduce latency
Developed a library for processing large Excel files and implemented caching for optimized inter-service communication
Collaborated with a team to ensure code quality, demonstrate features to clients, and resolve system issues
Utilized Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis in projects

projects.name: Banking Application API
summary: Developed a functional REST API for a demo banking application, following coding best practices and industry standards
Implemented user authentication & authorization using JWT and Spring Security

projects.name: Grievance System API
summary: Designed an anonymous grievance reporting and management approach that reduces 90% manual effort.
Architected a REST API that followed best practices and standard guidelines and deployed it on Azure.
Secured API through user authentication/authorization and RBAC using JWT

projects.name: ClubSocial
summary: A social media website, where users can post their ideas as messages, photos, and videos
Used Firebase for media storage, user authentication, etc.
Tech Stack: React, Semantic UI, Firebase
